tokens.resolved_gloss: to shroud, i.e. clothe (whether transitive or reflex.); hence (from the idea of darkness) to languish

tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

tokens.resolved_gloss: wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to stun (or intransitively, grow numb), i.e. devastate or (figuratively) stupefy (both usually in a passive sense)

tokens.resolved_gloss: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
